channel.title: Utorrent/ for router?
channel.description: ok Thanks helped me alot and got my server up and going but i need to know how to use utorrent or what to do or can i use that for my portfording thingy cause i dont know my routers username and password so can someone help me with utorrent?

item.title: Utorrent/ for router?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

Go to Options > Preferences > Connections in utorrent then put 43594 in the port or whatever you want to run your server on… I suggest you don’t use utorrent tho as it doesn’t work correctly at times… But that’s just for me idk about others.

Read full topic
